Hello, and welcome to the Command Traini: Hello, and welcome to the Command Training Grounds!
This map along with its companion video:
This map along with its companion video series is meant to
teach you how to use Minecraft commands.
If you already know some commands, keep:
If you already know some commands, keep completing the
exercises until you encounter one you can't solve.
Each section of exercises correspond to:
Each section of exercises correspond to a tutorial video.
Whenever you are stuck, click the link to the video.
If the link has scrolled off the top of:
If the link has scrolled off the top of the chat window, there
is a sign in the play area you can click to get it back.
In order for you to complete these exerc:
In order for you to complete these exercises, it is important
that you know how to look at the chat and click links in it.
To open the chat window, press T (or the:
To open the chat window, press '%s'. This shows the entire
chat window and frees up your mouse pointer so you can
click things.
